title: Random FPS Drops
body:
Hi All,

Really just looking for a solution to my problem, Basically I am having issues with fps drops in LOL, its perfect on any setting, but every now and again it drops to 30, I have tried toggling all setting and it still happens. It seems to happen more when I first start playing, and then not as much as the night goes on. I have monitored my temps and don't really see any spikes. I have a fresh windows, will all bloatware removed, new Bios, graphics drivers etc. I have re downloaded league basically done everything. I feel my specs are more than adequate to play LOL.

This is what I have 
Dell 7559 GRY
 Intel Core i7 6700HQ processor
Nvidia Geforce GTX960m 4gb
8 gigs Single channel DDR3L 1600
Normal 1TB 5400 (I think ) Hardrive

Please help 
Thanks All

replies.body: Your specs are absolutely good enough to run league, that's for sure! I noticed you've tried a lot of troubleshooting on your own already, so this might actually be caused by your system being a little _too_ good. Let's test [**enabling a frame cap**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs) to see if that helps.
Yeah done all that sadly, I wonder if perhaps the new client will make any difference ?
